rows.label: qst660104_msg0001
rows.name:
Wow! Your world sounds way different
from Alst, Shulk. I can't even imagine!

rows.label: qst660104_msg0002
rows.name:
But they also have a fair number of
things in common. It's so curious...

rows.label: qst660104_msg0003
rows.name:
In any case, now that we know what's
what, we can start exploring this place
in earnest.

rows.label: qst660104_msg0004
rows.name:
Hm.
Not that there's much to see here...

rows.label: qst660104_msg0005
rows.name:
Shulk, Fiorung, have you guys been
here before?

rows.label: qst660104_msg0006
rows.name: No, never.

rows.label: qst660104_msg0007
rows.name:
Fiorung and I were just walking, when
suddenly we saw this odd light...
It turned out to be a portal.

rows.label: qst660104_msg0008
rows.name:
And, Shulk being Shulk, he just had
to stick his nose in and see what it
was all about.

rows.label: qst660104_msg0009
rows.name: Yes, sorry about that...

rows.label: qst660104_msg0010
rows.name: What happened to us was fairly similar.

rows.label: qst660104_msg0011
rows.name:
Tora also think like Shulk!
Not care if curiosity killed Nopon,
cannot stop self from touching things!

rows.label: qst660104_msg0012
rows.name:
Wasn't it our chum who did the deed,
though?

rows.label: qst660104_msg0013
rows.name: ...Fact is irrelevant...

rows.label: qst660104_msg0014
rows.name:
So the portal you came through is
over there somewhere?

rows.label: qst660104_msg0015
rows.name:
Yeah. You came through a different
one, then?

rows.label: qst660104_msg0016
rows.name: That's right. It's just over there.

rows.label: qst660104_msg0017
rows.name: I...can't see anything.

rows.label: qst660104_msg0018
rows.name: Same here.

rows.label: qst660104_msg0019
rows.name: I suspected as much...

rows.label: qst660104_msg0020
rows.name:
Each of us can only see the portal
that we ourselves passed through.

rows.label: qst660104_msg0021
rows.name:
We can't travel to your world, Rex,
and you can't travel to ours.

rows.label: qst660104_msg0022
rows.name: So we can only meet here?

rows.label: qst660104_msg0023
rows.name: It seems that way.

rows.label: qst660104_msg0024
rows.name:
It decided then?
We spend nice time chatting here?

rows.label: qst660104_msg0025
rows.name: Ooh, shall I prepare some snacks?

rows.label: qst660104_msg0026
rows.name:
Oh, yes please, Homura!
I'd love a bite!

rows.label: qst660104_msg0027
rows.name: That not such good idea...

rows.label: qst660104_msg0028
rows.name: Who's there?!

rows.label: qst660104_msg0029
rows.name: The voice came from above!

rows.label: qst660104_msg0030
rows.name: Over here.

rows.label: qst660104_msg0031
rows.name: When did he...?!

rows.label: qst660104_msg0032
rows.name:
Is no big deal.
Not for Nopon Archsage.

rows.label: qst660104_msg0033
rows.name: Who are you?

rows.label: qst660104_msg0034
rows.name:
Nopon Archsage is great Nopon who,
through endless training in many times
and places, become sagest of sages.

rows.label: qst660104_msg0035
rows.name:
Even though Archsage look even
more littlepon than Tora?

rows.label: qst660104_msg0036
rows.name: Such rudepon.

rows.label: qst660104_msg0037
rows.name:
Despite appearance, Nopon Archsage
is hundred million times age of Tora.

rows.label: qst660104_msg0038
rows.name: A hundred million? I'm not buying it.

rows.label: qst660104_msg0039
rows.name:
Friends believe or not, it not matter.
But truth is truth, and truth is that
Nopon Archsage make this place.

rows.label: qst660104_msg0040
rows.name: You made this place?

rows.label: qst660104_msg0041
rows.name: Indeedy!

rows.label: qst660104_msg0042
rows.name: But whatever for?

rows.label: qst660104_msg0043
rows.name:
To pose, and witness overcoming of,
combat challenges of unimaginable and
frankly unbelievable difficulty.

rows.label: qst660104_msg0044
rows.name: He means to test our mettle, then...?

rows.label: qst660104_msg0045
rows.name: Strange hobby for a Nopon to have...

rows.label: qst660104_msg0046
rows.name:
Yeah. That doesn't sound very
pleasant at all...

rows.label: qst660104_msg0047
rows.name:
Mehh...?
That very upsetting to hear...

rows.label: qst660104_msg0048
rows.name:
As long as can get reward, Tora have
no problem with challenging challenge!

rows.label: qst660104_msg0049
rows.name: But of course!

rows.label: qst660104_msg0050
rows.name:
If friends can overcome challenges,
Nopon Archsage will fork over treats
commensurate with results.

rows.label: qst660104_msg0051
rows.name:
Ooh, ooh, can Tora win rare tropical
edition of Tasty Sausage?

rows.label: qst660104_msg0052
rows.name:
That was actually not very tasty,
so Nopon Archsage liquidate stock.

rows.label: qst660104_msg0053
rows.name:
Mehh? Tora come up with thing on
spur of moment. Is really real product?!

rows.label: qst660104_msg0054
rows.name:
May not have that particular item, but
still many other rare stuffs to give.

rows.label: qst660104_msg0055
rows.name: Sounds interesting, eh, Meleph?

rows.label: qst660104_msg0056
rows.name: I'd be lying if I said I wasn't curious...

rows.label: qst660104_msg0057
rows.name:
Well then, it sounds like we're up
to the challenge!

rows.label: qst660104_msg0058
rows.name: Shulk, Fiorung, what do you think?

rows.label: qst660104_msg0059
rows.name:
If it was Reyn, I'd probably say no way,
but... Eh, I'm in!

rows.label: qst660104_msg0060
rows.name:
You can't really get to know
someone without having a few
skirmishes together, right?

rows.label: qst660104_msg0061
rows.name: If Fiorung's feeling it, I'm in too.

rows.label: qst660104_msg0062
rows.name: Super-duper!

rows.label: qst660104_msg0063
rows.name:
But the way you guys fight is different
from how we do it in our world...
Why don't we take on a support role?

rows.label: qst660104_msg0064
rows.name: Good point.

rows.label: qst660104_msg0065
rows.name:
It looks like we can summon our
weapons at will. I guess that would
make us like your world's Blades.

rows.label: qst660104_msg0066
rows.name:
Wow, that's gotta be a nice skill
to have.

rows.label: qst660104_msg0067
rows.name:
Going into battle with Fiorung
sounds like it'd be a trip.

rows.label: qst660104_msg0068
rows.name: Look forward to it!

rows.label: qst660104_msg0069
rows.name:
Well then! When friends feel ready,
please give Nopon Archsage shout.

rows.label: qst660104_msg0070
rows.name: Then Challenge Battle can begin!

rows.label: qst660104_msg0110
rows.name: Fate of Hana and friends was similar!

rows.label: qst660104_msg0111
rows.name:
Tora also think like Shulk!
Not care if curiosity killed Nopon,
cannot stop self from touching things!

rows.label: qst660104_msg0112
rows.name:
But it was Rex-Rex who activate
portal, not Masterpon...

rows.label: qst660104_msg0128
rows.name: Who's there?!

rows.label: qst660104_msg0144
rows.name: So you want to test our strength...?

rows.label: qst660104_msg0155
rows.name: Tora wanna have go!

rows.label: qst660104_msg0156
rows.name:
I'm a bit curious myself.
Rex, don't you think we should try it?

rows.label: qst660104_msg0157
rows.name:
I'm with you, Nia.
And I love a good challenge!
